sub_topic: Balancing chemical equations for inorganic compounds
message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the reaction between iron(III) oxide and hydrogen gas to form iron metal and water?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the reaction between iron(III) oxide (Fe2O3) and hydrogen gas (H2) to form iron metal (Fe) and water (H2O) is:

Fe2O3 + 3H2 â†’ 2Fe + 3H2O
